title: SRFI 238: Codesets
author: Lassi Kortela
content:
SRFI 238 is now in draft status.  Many programming interfaces rely on a set of condition codes
  where each code has a numeric ID, a mnemonic symbol, and a
  human-readable message. This SRFI defines a facility to translate
  between numbers and symbols in a codeset and fetch messages by
  code. Examples are given using the Unix errno and
  signal codesets.
